Robot Test Cases

Setting Value Value value Value
Resource resources.html
Document Test cases for metadata in Setting table (incl. imports)  and within Test Case and  Keyword tables.
  doc u ment Text from multiple columns and lines is catenated with spaces. Real newlines need to be added with 'backslash+n' (e.g. '\n').
... Also variables work since Robot  ${version}, and they work from commandline too: ${SUITE_DOC_FROM_CLI}.
... Starting from RF 2.1 ${nonexisting} variables are just left unchanged.
... Of course escaping  (e.g.  '\${non-existing-in-suite-doc}' and '\\')  works too.
  Def ault TAGS @{default_tags}
Default Tags default-3 # Empty tags should be ignored # ROW 10
Forcetags force-1
Test Setup Log Default test setup
Test Teardown Log Default test teardown INFO
Suitesetup ${SUITE_SETUP_FROM_CLI} ${default} suite setup # Global variables work here
Suite Teardown ${SUITE_TEARDOWN_FROM_CLI} # ROW 15
Suite Tear down Default suite teardown
Test Timeout ${test_timeout}
meta: Name Value
meta: Multiple columns Value in multiple columns # ROW 20
Meta: Multiple lines Value in
meTa:multiple lines multiple lines '\n\n' and with
... real newlines
mETA:variables Version: ${version}
Meta: Variable from resource ${resource_file_var} # ROW 25
Meta:Var from CLI ${META_FROM_CLI} #Note that 'F' in 'From' is actually lowercase.
Meta: Escaping Three backslashes \\\\\\

Variable Value Value Value Value
${version} 1.2
@{default_tags} default-1 default-2 # default-3 added separately
${test_tag_base} test
@{test_tags} ${test_tag_base}-1 ${test_tag_base}-2 ${test_tag_base}-3
${default} Default
${log} Log
${test_timeout} 500 milliseconds
${keyword_timeout} ${test_timeout}
${one_second} 1 sec

lower case test case name [ Document ] This test has a lower case name but CSS capitalizes it in the test data. Robot should also capitalize it in output

Test Case Documentation With Non-Existing Variables [ Document ]Starting from RF ${2}.1 ${NONEX} variables are just left unchanged in all documentations. Existing ones are replaced: "${one_second}"
NOOP

[ Tags ] test-1 test-2
NOOP

... test-5
NOOP

[tags] @{non_existing} ${non_existing}
FailNot executed
